_sText:
This is my second finished map, it still has some texture bugs which I couldn't fix. I hope you guys enjoy it. 

Features:
2 Bombsites both located inside the CIA building. 
Has a sewer system to most buildings and areas of the map.


Install:


Installation:
Extract the map file (city_block_gpk.bsp), and the navigation file (city_block_gpk.nav) to your Counter-Strike maps folder (Usually located here:C:\Program Files\steam\steamapps\***YOURNAMEHERE***\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps)

Author: GabrielPapaK

Time spent: 13 Hours (aprox.)


Story:
The Terrorist want to go plant a timer detonated c4 inside the C.I.A. Public building. This building located in a small city which has many commercial buildings adjacent to it causes a problem. The terrorist have the idea to plant a bomb inside the lobby or communication room of the CIA. They can take refuge in any building like a restaurant, disco, factory or commercial building. The CT must stop them!
